title: Low Ping and FR lag?
body: I'm getting these moments where everyone else around me is moving and i can see every action they do, but for whatever reason my champ will ignore every command I give them for a solid 1-2 seconds and just stand there getting wailed on. I have 60-70 ping and well over 90 fps when this is happening. Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: It sounds like you're having input delays which can be caused by a bad connection failing to hold a strong connection to the game server.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune things up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
